hero.description: Discover a curated collection of the most exclusive developments in the Mexican Caribbean. Where architectural sophistication meets virgin nature.
featured.subtitle: Exclusive Portfolio
featured.title: Featured Developments
about.title: Redefining Luxury Real Estate
about.history_p1: Mimosa Developments is a Mexican company founded in 2017, dedicated to the conceptualization, development, and commercialization of luxury real estate projects in the Riviera Maya and southeastern Mexico.
about.history_p2: We stand out by offering comprehensive solutions to our clients, combining expert advisory, security, and an innovative vision to guarantee solid, high-value investments.
about.philosophy_desc: Every Mimosa development reflects a firm commitment to excellence: cutting-edge architectural design, top-tier finishes, and projects designed to captivate the senses and elevate lifestyles.
about.experience_desc: Mimosa Real Estate has consolidated its presence in the Riviera Maya advising national and international clients on real estate investments. Experience accompanying investors from the United States, Canada, and Europe with personalized strategies combining legal security, trust, and capital appreciation.
about.trajectory_desc: Before venturing into real estate development, Mimosa accumulated solid experience as a manufacturer of metal structures in large-scale projects.
about.trajectory_item1: Club Campestre Cordobes (2019) - 180 tons of steel
about.trajectory_item2: Cordoba - Veracruz Highway (2017-2020) - 3,600 tons of steel
about.trajectory_item3: Plaza San Jose, Cordoba (2017) - 230 tons of steel
about.synergy_desc: The success of our projects is built on the alliance between Mimosa Developments and Josue Hoil. Mimosa brings the real estate vision, market knowledge, and investor relations expertise. Josue Hoil ensures technical execution with precision, innovation, and construction quality.
about.constructor_desc: With over 15 years of experience, Josue Hoil has led large-scale projects in Mexico, Central America, and the Caribbean, managing over MXN $6,000 million in construction in the last five years.
about.constructor_exp1: Grupo Pinero (Bahia Principe) - Construction Director for hotels and tourist residences in Mexico and the Dominican Republic.
about.constructor_exp2: ICA - Project Manager for hospitals, stadiums, and research centers.
about.constructor_exp3: MEEC MAYYOR - Project Director, specialized in sustainable design for airports and hospitals.
about.commitment_desc: The synergy between Mimosa Developments and Josue Hoil guarantees construction precision, investment security, and high-value projects. Mimosa brings the real estate vision and Hoil the impeccable execution, creating the perfect team to provide certainty and security to investors.
about.pillar1.title: Excellence
about.pillar1.desc: Cutting-edge architectural design and top-tier finishes in every project.
about.pillar2.title: Legal Security
about.pillar2.desc: Personalized strategies combining legal security, trust, and capital appreciation.
about.pillar3.title: Innovation
about.pillar3.desc: Technical execution with precision, innovation, and world-class construction quality.
about.pillar4.title: Commitment
about.pillar4.desc: Long-term relationships built on transparency and investor satisfaction.
about.quote: Every Mimosa development reflects a firm commitment to excellence. Projects designed to captivate the senses and elevate lifestyles.
